courses.title: Prepwise â€“ AI Mock Interview Platform
courses.description: Prepwise is an AI-powered mock interview platform built with Next.js, Firebase, and TailwindCSS. It offers real-time feedback, voice-based interview simulations using Vapi AI and Google Gemini, and a responsive dashboard for session management.

courses.title: Easy-Eats
courses.description: Easy-Eats is a food ordering app using React, CSS, and Redux Toolkit. It fetches restaurant data via Swiggy's API and allows users to browse, filter cuisines, and manage their cart for seamless ordering.

courses.title: Codepen Editor
courses.description: Master the Codepen editor to create, test, and share your code with ease. Explore advanced features to enhance your web development skills.

courses.title: Task Manager
courses.description: Build a task manager application to organize your daily tasks efficiently. Learn how to implement CRUD operations and manage state effectively.

courses.title: Dev-X-pert
courses.description: Dev-x-pert is an online education platform where I provide courses on Web Development, MERN, MEAN Stack, Java, and more. Focused on practical learning, the platform helps students build strong, real-world tech skills.

courses.title: Weather App
courses.description: Create your very own weather application with real-time data. Learn how to use APIs to fetch and display dynamic weather information.
